title: Cannabis stocks lead TSX higher at open as 'Cannabis 2.0' kicks off
text:
Cannabis stocks lead TSX higher at open as 'Cannabis 2.0' kicks off

Stock Markets 51 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 09:48)

© Reuters. CANADA STOCKS-Cannabis stocks lead TSX higher at open as 'Cannabis 2.0' kicks off Oct 17(Reuters) - Canada's main stock index rose at open on Thursday, in broad-based gains, led by cannabis stocks as legalization of marijuana derivatives including edibles and beverages took effect. * At 9:30 a.m. ET (13:30 GMT), the Toronto Stock Exchange's S&P/TSX composite index was up 29.08 points, or 0.18%, at 16,456.26.

Cannabis stocks lead TSX higher at open as 'Cannabis 2.0' kicks off
description: Cannabis stocks lead TSX higher at open as 'Cannabis 2.0' kicks off
